description: Kickstart your workflow with a ready-to-use starter that bundles everyday utilities. Greet people, run basic calculations, check the current time, and generate images from text. Customize and extend it to fit your needs.

hfToken.description: Hugging Face API token for image generation (optional)

capabilities.name: greeting
capabilities.description: Returns a greeting message in the specified language

capabilities.name: calc
capabilities.description: Performs basic arithmetic operations on two numbers

capabilities.name: current_time
capabilities.description: Returns the current time in the specified timezone

capabilities.name: generate_image
capabilities.description: Generates an image from a text prompt using FLUX.1-schnell model
